Bucket tool

Back to index

The bucket tool can be used to fill a raster layer with a solid colour.

  1. The color input. Clicking it opens a colour selector for selecting a colour to be used with the bucket tool.
  2. The apply button. Clicking it actually activates the bucket tool, filling the selected layer with the solid colour given.

The bucket tool only works with raster layers. If the selected layer is not a raster layer, the color input and apply button will be disabled.
